title: Database Schema & Prisma Setup
description: Define User and Merchant models in Prisma schema. Configure indexes for email lookups. Run initial migration.
acceptance_criteria: Schema defined; Migration applied; Client generated

title: Registration API Route & Validation
description: Implement Next.js API Route handler. Setup Zod schema for email (RFC 5322) and password complexity. Atomic transactions.
acceptance_criteria: Zod rejects invalid inputs; Atomic User/Merchant creation
definition_of_done: API tests passing; Error handling verified

title: JWT Utility Implementation
description: Create functions to sign/verify Access/Refresh tokens using jose/jsonwebtoken. Define payload structure.

title: OAuth Client Setup & Redirect Handler
description: Configure Salla API constants. Implement redirect handler generating state and constructing auth URL.
acceptance_criteria: Redirects to Salla; State parameter stored

title: OAuth Callback & Token Exchange
description: Implement callback route. Validate state (CSRF). Exchange auth code for tokens via Salla API.
acceptance_criteria: Validates state; Exchanges code; Handles errors
definition_of_done: Integration test with mock Salla response

title: Salla API Client & Pagination Implementation
description: Extend Salla Client to handle pagination. Implement strict rate-limit handling (429 exponential backoff).
definition_of_done: Unit tests with mock API rate limits

title: ClickHouse Schema Definition & Optimization
description: Draft SQL for SalesFact/AbandonedCartFact. Select MergeTree engine. Define Sorting/Partition Keys.

title: Sync Worker Orchestration (QStash)
description: Implement Next.js API route as QStash worker. Dispatch sub-jobs per resource (Products, Orders).
acceptance_criteria: Validates signature; Dispatches jobs; Handles timeouts

title: Loader Worker Infrastructure
description: Setup background worker to consume from QStash CDC queue. Configure ClickHouse client with connection pooling.
acceptance_criteria: Worker receives events; Secure client configuration

title: Data Transformer (ETL)
description: Implement logic to transform normalized Postgres entities into denormalized ClickHouse Fact rows.
acceptance_criteria: Flattens Order+Items correctly; Type conversions handled
definition_of_done: Unit tests covering all entity types

title: Context Retrieval Service
description: Implement service to query pgvector for relevant schema info based on user input embedding.

title: Prompt Engineering & Construction
description: Design system prompt injecting Schema, Context, and Rules. Implement token limit management.
acceptance_criteria: Prompt fits window; Tenant isolation enforced; Output valid SQL
